title: how to set Found new harware wizard to automatic and eliminate restart message (XPsp2)

forumNotes.author: Zoso
forumNotes.content:
XP pro sp2, n-lited, usboot activated, firadisk installed.  

Ive attached all usb devices to the OS before I copy it to an image for ram booting and I have set the registry key:  
HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\\DeviceInstal\\Settings  

with Dword: SuppressNewHWUI to 1  

after Ram booting this image with grub4dos it pops up found new hardware (disk drive)  

I have tried it with an ImDisk image and CloneDisk image. even booted the ram image then exported mounted devices key and Imported it into the original os then copied it back to the same image and still get the found new hardware wizard.  

Im out of ideas, anyone have suggestions?  

thanks

forumNotes.author: Sha0
forumNotes.content: I think you need the [special version of Umpnpmgr.dll](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/938596 "External link").
